title: Sky City Flight
description: Soar through the sky and fly over the majestic Sky City! Navigate your aircraft through challenging obstacles, collect power-ups, and see how high you can fly in this thrilling aerial adventure. Test your reflexes and aim for the highest score as you explore the beautiful sky city landscapes.
controls: Touch or click to control your aircraft. Avoid obstacles and collect items to increase your score. The higher you fly, the more challenging it becomes!
author: LightGame Team
